Engineering. Business. Data science.

I am interested in combining data science, business and management, and engineering to build new products and business models. I bring a research-oriented mindset and iterative, hypothesis-driven approach to solving ambiguous problems. My diverse background in innovation strategy, R&D management and consulting, mechanical engineering, and industrial manufacturing enables me to better understand problems and identify solutions. I specialize in building and executing R&D strategies under circumstances of high technical and market uncertainty.

My resume, and portfolio highlight a range of data, business, and engineering projects. Feel free to get in contact with me.

Protecting your services-based business

18 Dec 2015
Many up-and-coming business models rely on services. Services can multiply the value of a product, but services without underlying products can only offer limited competitive advantage. A product-based strategy will always be important.
